Here are some helpful links in case you miss class for excused or non-excused reasons:
* [Excused absence form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc0-bu6tZjii3VAzJdL9JiayywoWC14U4xXrWgwjIqwA7Maxg/viewform) if you miss class for excused reasons.
* [Make-up work form](https://forms.gle/1gh7irUBoDRgmTNW9) if you miss class for non-excused reasons.
* Lastly, check out the discussion assignments on Canvas, if you miss discussion due to non-excused reasons
